title: Development and Customization
description: For developers looking to contribute or customize the module:

children.value: For developers looking to contribute or customize the module:

props.code:
# Install dependencies
npm install

# Generate type stubs and start development
npm run dev:prepare
npm run dev

# Build the playground for production
npm run dev:build
